title: RIOT LISTEN UP
body: Whenever I get into a game and after champ select screen it goes black and says I'm not connected to the server. It's not my internet and I tried restarting already. If anyone knows how to fix it please tell me!

replies.body: The black screen and error would indicate a poor connection to our server, so it can't download assets or stay keep you in sync.  Even if you can use the net without issue, you can still have problems specifically connecting to game servers.  I recommend going over every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I've tried everything u said and it still doesn't work. I used the hextech repair tool to reinstall and force repatch, but it still doesn't work. Please reply asap!

Thanks for trying those steps!  If you're still having an issue with this, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look.  Attach the logs the hextech repair tool provides to your ticket for context.  We'll respond asap!
